summary: Don't go through the intro. Just load these save game and then your able to change your race and name and then your free to roam Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
There are two files just saved after you exit the secret escape route from Helgen. One save is escaping with the Imperials and the other save is escaping with the Stormcloaks. Once installed just load the file and edit your character and name and begin playing Skyrim. This way you will not have to go through the intro of the game. These saved game only requires Skyrim. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/713/?]here[/url]. Also if you have Oblivion check out our [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/28903]Oblivion Quickstart[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75092/?]Exit Helgen Change Character Menu[/url]Â (Not required but highly recommended)

To install just download then extract folder and drag the saved games into your My Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves
author: LegoManIAm94
